CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl apt-transport-https &&     curl -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | apt-key add - &&     echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list &&     apt-get update && apt-get install -y yarn
Commands.Name: run
